bs-privacy-prefs-cookieacceptmandatory-h: Wen you look this field, the screen dey change to grey so e go allow users to anything till them accept the cookies
bs-privacy-prefs-privacypolicymandatory-: As the user dey look the field, them go force am to accept the privacy policy with terms of service, before him go fit access other pages.
bs-privacy-prefs-privacypolicyonlogin-la: Make you gree for the login of privacy policy
bs-privacy-prefs-privacypolicyonlogin-he: For the login process, we go add accepting of privacy policy as you dey check this field.
